title: Lessons from a First Time EV Owner. This jibes with my experience....
content:
Lessons from a First Time EV Owner. This jibes with my experience. Home charging is key, cold weather is tough to deal with, and long-range trips can be challenging. But you get used to it and I donâ€™t ever want to own an ICE car again.
